channel.title: Comments on: Actionable Tips To Optimize Your WordPress Site For Page Speed
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Vishal Sharma
item.dc:creator: Vishal Sharma
item.description: How long your blog takes to load is an important parameter that most bloggers overlook. Google takes page loading times pretty seriously; it ranks fast loading pages over slower ones. Fixing your page speed time can be a hassle. You are required to get your hands dirty with code and tweak various factors that influence your loading time. Guess what? My techniques can decrease your page loading times enormously. I take into consideration ever little variable that can actually reduce your load time. :)
